meanings.sent1: The cat was twitching its tail nervously.
meanings.sent2: She twitched the curtain aside to peek outside.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel kept twitching its nose comically.
meanings.sent4: His fingers were twitching with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's feet were twitching in anticipation of the music.

meanings.sent1: I felt a twitching in my eye when I was tired.
meanings.sent2: The twitching of the rabbit's nose was adorable.
meanings.sent3: The twitching of the candle flame made shadows dance on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The twitching of the fishing line signaled a bite.
meanings.sent5: The twitching of the bird's wings caught my attention.
